original: CARLSTEDT, Ragnar Leonard, Disponent, Stockholm, f Sthlm 19/6 09 av dir Ragnar C o Tina Lundström, gm Stina Seelig. Ord stud KTH, spec.stud Techn Hochsch, Berlin. Ing A G Feuerungstechnik Berlin o fma E F Bau-richter Neustadt/Dosse 30—32, verkst.ch AB Area Regulatorer 33—34. Ing AB LUX 34—35, Hopkinson Ltd Huddersfield Engl 35—36, försäljn.ch o disp AB Area Regulatorer 36^-39, vkst dir AB Maskincarli sed. 39, ag dta föret. Resor: Finl 26—27, Tyskl 29—32, Engl 35—36. Medl o förtroenden! Sv Uppfinn.frn. Hobbies: Segling, tennis, bowling, flugfiske. CARL STEN, John Erik, Organisationschef, Höglandstorget, f Ledsjö, Skarab l, 9/7 93 av förv J N C o Hilda Abrahamsson, gm Vera Malmar. Fil kand Upps 15; resoff. Anst Lif-försäkr AB Victoria 16, aman Pensionsstyr 17 o jvg.styr 18—23, ch SJ:s resebyrå London 24—29, ch Sv Lloyds passageraravd 30—37, dir dta AB 36—37, org.ch Livförsäkr.bol Framtiden sed. 38. Sekr utredn om sjöförbind m Engl 18—19, östersjökomm 18—20, aktuarie Köpm olycksfallsförsäkr.bol 19—23, sekr o skattm Turisttraf.frb 20—23, sekr o matemat Sv-finska traf.komm 21—23, vkst dir AB Swe-dish Tourist Traffic Ass 22—24. Tj.res f SJ t Finl, Norge, Danm, Tyskl, Belg, Holl, Engl, Irl, Frankr, Ital. Av trycket: »Motoring in Sweden» (34, 37), ett fiert brosch i turistämn (25—38). RVO, RFinlVRO.
translated:
CARLSTEDT, Ragnar Leonard, Manager, Stockholm, born in Stockholm on June 19, 1909, son of director Ragnar C and Tina Lundström, married to Stina Seelig. Completed regular studies at the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH), specialized studies at the Technical University of Berlin. Engineer at A G Feuerungstechnik Berlin and assistant to the construction judge at E F Bau-richter Neustadt/Dosse from 1930 to 1932. Worked as a sales representative at AB Area Regulatorer from 1933 to 1934, engineer at AB LUX from 1934 to 1935, Hopkinson Ltd in Huddersfield, England from 1935 to 1936, sales manager and manager at AB Area Regulatorer from 1936 to 1939, and managing director at AB Maskincarli since 1939, an agency company. Traveled to Finland from 1926 to 1927, Germany from 1929 to 1932, and England from 1935 to 1936. Member and official of the Swedish Inventors' Association. Hobbies: Sailing, tennis, bowling, fly fishing.

CARL STEN, John Erik, Chief Organizer, Höglandstorget, born in Ledsjö, Skaraborg county, on July 9, 1893, son of supervisor J N C and Hilda Abrahamsson, married to Vera Malmar. Holds a Bachelor's degree from Uppsala University, military officer. Employed at Lif-försäkr AB Victoria from 1916, clerk at Pensionsstyr from 1917 to 1923, and in railway management from 1918 to 1923. Head of SJ's travel agency in London from 1924 to 1929, head of Swedish Lloyd's passenger department from 1930 to 1937, director of the mentioned company from 1936 to 1937, and chief organizer at the life insurance company Framtiden since 1938. Secretary of the investigation on sea connections with England from 1918 to 1919, Baltic Sea Commission from 1918 to 1920, actuary at Köpm olycksfallsförsäkr.bol from 1919 to 1923, secretary and treasurer at Turisttraf.frb from 1920 to 1923, secretary and mathematician at Sv-finska traf.komm from 1921 to 1923, and managing director at AB Swedish Tourist Traffic Association from 1922 to 1924. Traveled extensively as a representative of SJ to Finland, Norway, Denmark, Germany, Belgium, the Netherlands, England, Ireland, France, and Italy. Publications include "Motoring in Sweden" (1934, 1937) and a four-part brochure on tourism (1925 to 1938). Royal Order of Vasa (RVO), Finnish Order of the White Rose (RFinlVRO).
